product.name: Black coffee
product.description: Strong coffee, only black coffee, rich aroma

product.name: Americano
product.description: Coffee made using the Espresso method but with hot water added.

product.name: Espresso
product.description: Coffee is brewed with a small amount of boiling water that is almost pressed under pressure (squeezing) the ground coffee beans.

product.name: Latte
product.description: Coffee is made using the Espresso method but with steamed milk added.

product.name: Cappuccino
product.description: Coffee is made using the Espresso method but with steamed milk and foam added

product.name: Doppio
product.description: double coffee, extracted by double filter of coffee in total filter, the same ingredients as Espresso.

product.name: Cortado
product.description: a type of coffee with milk that cuts the intensity of the espresso, reducing its acidity while preserving the coffee's flavor.

product.name: Macchiato
product.description: a coffee based on the perfect combination of coffee, milk tea, goat tea with a layer of rich cream.

product.name: Mocha
product.description: Coffee is brewed using the Espresso method and then adding coffee and hot milk.

product.name: Red Eye
product.description: An enhanced coffee drink in which espresso is combined with normal drip coffee

product.name: Lungo
product.description: a coffee beverage made using an espresso machine to make an Italian-style coffee - short black (a single shot of espresso) with more water
